content:
MailEncoding Enum

Definition

Provides enumerated values for e-mail encoding. Recommended alternative: System.Net.Mail.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")]
public enum MailEncoding
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
MailEncoding

Fields

Base64

Specifies that the e-mail message uses Base64 encoding.
UUEncode

Specifies that the e-mail message uses UUEncode encoding.
